exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat x, y : K l : V Hcv : mult y x = one Unable to unify "forall (a : nat -> R) (x : R), ex_pseries a x <-> ex_series (fun n : nat => a n * x ^ n)" with "(0 < n)%nat -> is_pseries a x l -> is_pseries (PS_decr_n a n) x (scal (pow_n y n) (plus l (opp (sum_n (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (a k)) (n - 1)))))".

In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V n : nat x, y : K l : V Hcv : mult y x = one H0 : (0 < n)%nat H1 : is_pseries a x l H : forall (a : nat -> R) (x : R), ex_series (fun n : nat => a n * x ^ n) -> ex_pseries a x H2 : forall (a : nat -> R) (x : R), ex_pseries a x -> ex_series (fun n : nat => a n * x ^ n) Unable to unify "mult y x = one" with "is_pseries (PS_decr_n a n) x (scal (pow_n y n) (plus l (opp (sum_n (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (a k)) (n - 1)))))".

original: intro Hcv. apply ex_pseries_R. apply Hcv.
